issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Enable Decimal64 reader after orc version upgrade

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Following tests are disabled in HIVE-19629 as orc ConvertTreeReaderFactory does not handle Decimal64ColumnVectors. This jira is to re-enable those tests after orc supports it.

1) type_change_test_int_vectorized.q
 2) type_change_test_int.q
 3) orc_schema_evolution_float.q

4) schema_evol_orc_nonvec_part_all_primitive.q

5) schema_evol_orc_nonvec_part_all_primitive_llap_io.q

6) schema_evol_orc_vec_part_all_primitive.q

7) schema_evol_orc_vec_part_all_primitive_llap_io.q
fields.summary: Upgrade orc to 1.5.2 and enable decimal_64 schema evolution tests

comments.body: Tested the tests with ORC-379 and the tests worked as expected. Will wait for next orc release.

Now that orc 1.5.2 is released. Updated .2 patch.

 

[~mmccline] can you please take a look?
